> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight tried to get concentred and formed an energy ball. She shooted it
> against the glowing cilinder but missed. She feel weak and waited some time
> before to try a to do it again

<NEW>

When NIGHTLIGHT tried to fire at the cylinder of energy SHARPEDGE's
jaw dropped and STAMPY ducked and covered his optics as they both
yelled out "NO!!"

When nothing catastrophic happened STAMPY looked over at NIGHTLIGHT,
"You don't shoot cylinders of unknown black glowing energy with
blasters!" He said in a tone that was equal parts relief, disbelief
and exasperation. "They have a bad habit of blowing up and taking out
everything with it."

STAMPY spoke as if he was an expert although this was probably the
first time he had encountered something quite like this.

Meanwhile SHARPEDGE walked over to the console that NIGHTLIGHT had
managed to hit, "I hope this wasn't too important." he said as he
sighed. The console was burnt and blacked from the blast and obviously
unusable.

STAMPY nodded as he winced, his head obviously still in pain. "We need
to hurry up and find a way to shut this thing off. I am sure that
blast caught someone's attention."

(TAG)

- Preston
